tests.name: FTPServer.Open
tests.setup: mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && cd .. && if [ ! -d "test_remote/" ]; then (git clone https://github.com/N2Sys-EDU/Lab1-myFTP-Test.git test_remote && cp test_remote/ftp_server_std build/ && cp test_remote/ftp_client_std build/ && cd test_remote && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make && cd ../.. && cp test_remote/build/ftp_test build/) fi
